alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:48AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rock Island, northwestern Whiteside, south central Carroll, northeastern Scott and Clinton Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 348 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grand Mound, or 15 miles south of Maquoketa, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clinton, DeWitt, Camanche, Fulton, Wheatland, Grand Mound, Delmar, Lost Nation, Calamus, Charlotte, Low Moor, Welton, Toronto, Andover, Goose Lake, Lyons, Malone, Folletts, Teeds Grove and Elvira. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
